    Resources for Covid-afflicted:

    A list of some links to assist in the fight against covid, financially or otherwise. Will be constantly updated. Please feel free to email me any other sources/corrections you find at sk3269@cornell.edu. These are some amazing people doing amazing work in an ocean of help needed so please help if you can.

    India

    Government Relief

    1. PM National Relief Fund
      https://pmnrf.gov.in/en/online-donation

    2. Delhi Government Relief Fund
      https://bit.ly/3bpV7tm

    3. Other states - Available on different UPI apps/BHIM

    Corporate Social Relief

    1. Zomato - Provide meal kits (flour, rice, pulses) to daily wage earners across India
      https://www.feedingindia.org/donate

    Crowdsourcing

    1. Give India - Provide min. wage to daily wage laborers identified through trusted non-profit partners of Give India
      https://indiafightscorona.giveindia.org/support-families

    2. Give India - Same as above; led by Govind Iyer, board member at Give India
      https://bit.ly/2UeWsgL

    3. Give India - Provide sanitation kits and essential provisions (rice, daal, salt etc.) to vulnerable communities
      https://indiafightscorona.giveindia.org/prevention-kit

    4. Milaap - Multiple fundraisers by individuals and NGOs. Please try to verify authenticity of the fundraisers
      https://milaap.org/communities/covid-19

    5. Ketto - Multiple fundraisers by individuals and NGOs. Please try to verify authenticity of the fundraisers
      https://covid19.ketto.org

    Non-Profits

    1. Aajevika - Comprehensive relief and post-pandemic rebuilding of migrant lives
      https://aajeevika.org/

    2. Uday Foundation - Donate care kit (soaps and sanitizer) and/or food supplies (flour, rice, pulses, cooking oil, and other items) to the needy
      https://www.udayfoundation.org/coronavirus-disease-covid-19/

    3. Hasiru Dala - Donate kits including food and soap to waste-pickers’ families across six districts of Karnataka
      http://hasirudala.in/news/wastepickers-and-covid19/

    4. Delhi Youth Welfare Association - Direct cash transfer to families of daily wage laborers in Delhi
      https://www.ourdemocracy.in/Campaign/covid19Delhi

    5. AhmedabadFightsCorona - Initiative by multiple NGOs in Ahmedabad to support daily wage laborers, old age homes, and shelter homes
      https://pages.razorpay.com/pl_EW357Eyk0tOlaa/view

    6. Goonj - Support for daily wage laborers
      https://goonj.org/support-covid-19-affected

    7. Jan Sahas - Support families of migrant workers from Bundelkhand stuck in Delhi
      https://pages.razorpay.com/jansahasdonate

    Medical Relief

    1. PharmEasy - Donate an N95 mask (₹200.00) to a healthcare worker; PharmEasy will match your donation
      https://pages.razorpay.com/COVID-19-Mask-1

    Research Grants

    1. ActGrants - Sponsor ideas contributing to Researching/Fighting Covid
      https://actgrants.in

    Shelter And Housing


    Organizations For Contact


    United States

    Research Initiatives

    1. Sagacious Research - 1000 complimentary hrs of research assistance
      https://www.sagaciousresearch.com/coronavirus-research-assistance/?fbclid=IwAR2mCvwWNOFdE1_rPfkQEv371BNOVezU7Kd5VoJuKnNfb8DVW4I1j4vcLwY

    Government Initiatives

    1. American Rescue Plan
      https://www.whitehouse.gov/american-rescue-plan/

    2. List of government resources and links
      https://www.usaspending.gov/disaster/covid-19?publicLaw=all

    3. SAMHSA Help, support, guidance
      https://www.samhsa.gov/coronavirus

    More to come..
